rukus.text: 21|51|aur hamane pradaan kee thee ibraaheem ko, usakee chetana isase pahale aur ham usase bhalee-bhaanti avagat the.
21|52|jab usane apane baap tatha apanee jaati se kahaah ye pratimaen (moortiyaan) kaisee hain, jinakee pooja mein tum lage hue ho
21|53|unhonne kahaah hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko inakee pooja karate hue.
21|54|us (ibraaheem) ne kahaah nishchay tum aur tumhaare poorvaj khule kupath mein ho.
21|55|unhonne kahaah kya tum laaye ho hamaare paas saty ya tum upahaas kar rahe ho
21|56|usane kahaah balki tumhaara paalanahaar aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar hai, jisane unhen paida kiya hai aur main to iseeka saakshee hoon.
21|57|tatha allaah kee shapath! main avashy chaal chaloonga tumhaaree moortiyon ke saath, isake pashchaat ki tum chale jao.
21|58|phir usane kar diya unhen khand-khand, unake bade ke siva, taaki ve usakee or phiren.
21|59|unhonne kahaah kisane ye dasha kar dee hai, hamaare poojyon ( devataon) kee? vaastav mein, vah koee atyaachaaree hoga
21|60|logon ne kahaah hamane suna hai ek navayuvak ko unakee charcha karate, jise ibraaheem kaha jaata hai.
21|61|logon ne kahaah use lao logon ke saamane, taaki log dekhen.
21|62|unhonne poochhaah kya toone hee ye kiya hai, hamaare poojyon ke saath, he ibraaheem
21|63|usane kahaah balki ise inake is bade ne kiya[1] hai, to inheen se poochh lo, yadi ye bolate hon
21|64|phir apane man mein ve soch mein pad gaye aur (apane man mein) kahaah vaastav mein, tumheen atyaachaaree ho.
21|65|phir vah ondhe kar diye gaye apane siron ke bal[1] ( aur boleh) too jaanata hai ki ye bolate nahin hain.
21|66|ibraaheem ne kahaah to kya tum ibaadat (vandana) allaah ke siva usakee karate ho, jo na tumhen kuchh laabh pahuncha sakate hain aur na tumhen haani pahooncha sakate hain
21|67|tuf (thoo) hai tumapar aur usapar jisakee tum ibaadat (vandana) karate ho allaah ko chhodakar. to kya tum samajh nahin rakhate ho
21|68|unhonne kahaah ise jala do tatha sahaayata karo apane poojyon kee, yadi tumhen kuchh karana hai.
21|69|hamane kahaah he agni! too sheetal tatha shaanti ban ja, ibraaheem par.
21|70|aur unhonne usake saath buraee chaahee, to hamane unheen ko kshatigrast kar diya.
21|71|aur ham, us (ibraaheem) ko bachaakar le gaye tatha loot[1] ko, us bhoomi[2] kee or, jisamen hamane sampannata rakhee hai, vishv vaasiyon ke lie.
21|72|aur hamane use pradaan kiya (putr) ishaaq aur (pautr) yaaqoob usapar adhik aur pratyek ko hamane satkarmee banaaya.

21|73|aur hamane unhen agranee (pramukh) bana diya, jo hamaare aadeshaanusaar (logon ko) supath darshaate hain tatha hamane vahyee (prakaashana) kee, unakee or satkarmon ke karane, namaaz kee sthaapana karane aur zakaat dene kee tatha ve hamaare hee upaasak the.
21|74|tatha loot ko hamane nirnay shakti aur gyaan diya aur bacha liya us bastee se, jo dushkarm kar rahee thee, vaastav mein, ve bure avagyaakaaree log the.
21|75|aur hamane pravesh diya use apanee daya mein, vaastav mein, vah sadaachaariyon mein se tha.
